messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling Husbands
messages.msgSnippet: If he has some particular issues, Ben will be happy to chat with him. His e-mail addy at work is: benjamin.lovejoy@scmcen.ang.af.mil The dads lists are still
messages.messageBody:
If he has some particular issues, Ben will be happy to chat with him. His e-mail addy at work is:

benjamin.lovejoy@...

The dads' lists are still there too. Ben just can't access them right now. Other dads are there though!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org


-----Original Message-----
From: Christy Putnam <personal_balance@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Mon, 6 Mar 2006 11:27:56 -0600
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling Husbands


I am wondering if any once-skeptical-of-unschooling dads would be willing to
either set up a yahoo group or just privately email with my dh. I think it
would really help new-to-unschooling dads understand and learn to trust the
process if they were able to talk to other dads that were once skeptical.

Any dads out there wanna help another dad be able to enjoy and trust their
kids?

In Gratitude,

Christy Putnam
Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11)
Loving wife of Chet (ann. 7/4/04)

<http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance>
http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance

"Go confidently in the direction of your
dreams. Live the life you have always
imagined." - Henry David Thoreau



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]




Yahoo! Groups Links






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling Husbands
messages.msgSnippet: Ben s on both the SSUDs and the UnschoolingDads lists, but our computers are D-E-A-D, and we have limited access right now. Ben will be speaking and hosting
messages.messageBody:
Ben's on both the SSUDs and the UnschoolingDads lists, but our computers are D-E-A-D, and we have limited access right now.

Ben will be speaking and hosting Dads' get-togethers at both the New England Unschooling Conference in Peabody, MA in May and the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference in Albuquerque, NM in September.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

check this one out. If I recall Ben Lovejoy is on this one also..


Laura

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Husbands
messages.msgSnippet: ... My DH might be willing to chat but he was never skeptical - he is more convinced than I am even. That s good since he s the at home parent. There already
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Christy Putnam"
<personal_balance@...> wrote:
>
> I am wondering if any once-skeptical-of-unschooling dads would be
>willing to
> either set up a yahoo group or just privately email with my dh. I
>think it
> would really help new-to-unschooling dads understand and learn to
>trust the
> process if they were able to talk to other dads that were once
>skeptical.
>
> Any dads out there wanna help another dad be able to enjoy and
>trust their
> kids?
>
> In Gratitude,
>
> Christy Putnam
My DH might be willing to 'chat' but he was never skeptical - he is
more convinced than I am even. That's good since he's the at home
parent. There already is a yahoo group for dads UnschoolingDads - no
moms allowed!

--Deb

who still have hubbies half on the fence !!

So PLEASE don't keep it off list !!

Carol
